messages.subject: Re: Kaypro
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/16/2005 4:56:21 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: A  Kay_Pro 64 was so named because it had this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/16/2005 4:56:21 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

A Kay_Pro 64 was so named because it had this astounding amount of
memory for its day - 64 K. :)



Oh, my, I loved my Kaypro. It was "portable" if you were a bit of a
weightlifter, and it looked like a slightly drunken sewing machine case. As Windows
started coming out, I wanted to get a tee shirt that said "I ain't afraid of
no DOS."

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
